qas.question: Where did the Bells live when the Halifax Explosion happened?
On what day did the Halifax Explosion happen?
Which of their two homes did the Bells start spending more time as Bell aged?
What did the Bells do to help the victims in Halifax?

context: Until the end of his life, Bell and his family would alternate between the two homes, but <a0_0><a2_0>Beinn Bhreagh<a2_0/><a0_0/> would, over the next 30 years, become more than a summer home as Bell became so absorbed in his experiments that his annual stays lengthened. Both Mabel and Bell became immersed in the <a3_0>Baddeck<a3_0/> community and were accepted by the villagers as "their own".[N 22] The Bells were still in residence at Beinn Bhreagh when the Halifax Explosion occurred on <a1_0>December 6, 1917<a1_0/>. Mabel and Bell <a4_0>mobilized the community<a4_0/> to help victims in Halifax.
